name: Mojo Video Poker Lite
description:
Mojo Video Poker Lite is a fast, realistic, video poker experience. Mojo Video Poker supports 360 degrees of game play. You can play in portrait mode, or rotate your device for bigger cards and play in landscape. Features three completely different game types:

• Classic Video Poker
• Triple Hand Video Poker
• Super Multiplier Poker

Each game mode has 2 game types included.

• Jacks or Better
• Deuces Wild

Mojo Video Poker has GameCenter Achievements and Leaderboards.

Vivid graphics, animations and clear sounds makes this aim to be the most realistic Video Poker experience on the iPhone. We are constantly updating the application to make it the best free video poker app available.

Mojo Video Poker is the free version of Mojo Video Poker. It is Ad supported.

* If you enjoy the game please take a moment to rate us, it helps us make time for more improvements.
